did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Kimberling Lutheran Church Records, German Originals, (Photocopies) 1779-1880

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Kimberling Lutheran Church Records, German Originals, (Photocopies), Mss. Collection 2010.15, Kegley Library, Wytheville Community College, Wytheville, VA

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Donated by Mary B. Kegley in June 2010.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of photocopies of the original German language records of Kimberling Lutheran Church in Wythe County, Virginia. The photocopies were used by authors Tim Smith, Beverly Repass Hoch, and Mary B. Kegley for their book, Kimberling Church, Wythe County, Virginia: Annotated Baptismal and Cemetery Records.
Folder 1 contains the photocopy of the original German language records. Folder 2 contains research and correspondence relating to research and publication of the book.

bibliography.head: Bibliography
bibliography.bibref: Hoch, Beverly Repass. Kimberling Church, Wythe County, Virginia: Annotated Baptismal and Cemetery Records. Wytheville, VA: Kegley Books, 1986.
